settings.announcement_text: Get 15% off on a purchase of above INR 10000. Use the code FINELYCRAFTED at checkout. Free shipping across India. COD accepted.

settings.title: About Us
settings.content: Studio Covers is a designer furnishings brand that believes in creating sustainable luxury for those who appreciate the finer things in life. We started out as a soft furnishings studio in the 1990s and have worked on over 80 5-star projects and 500+ high-end residences across India and overseas. We strive to keep design and craftsmanship at the centre of everything that we do. Explore luxury cushion covers, bedspreads, throws, table runners, bedsheets, pillowslips, and body pillows that are meant to last for years to come. We ship across India.

settings.newsletter_richtext: Sign up for our newsletter if you'd like to be kept up-to-date on new launches, offers and more exciting news by Studio Covers!

settings.map_address: Studio Covers, Block B, Sector 60, Noida, Uttar Pradesh

settings.title: Can I place an order for a product that’s currently out of stock?
settings.subtitle: No, we currently do not offer this at the moment but are working hard at bringing more features to the website! What you can do is mail us at hello@studiocovers.co with a link to the product that is out of stock. We promise to be good listeners :) You can sign up for the newsletter by going down to the bottom right corner of our website.

settings.title: Will I be charged for delivery?
settings.subtitle:
We are offering FREE SHIPPING on all orders above INR 5000 across India.
You can also take a look at our shipping policy here.

settings.title: By when can I expect to receive my order?
settings.subtitle: You should receive your order within 7-14 days. However, in case they do not, kindly contact us and we’ll get back to you within 2-4 days on the status of your order and why exactly it’s taking so long. However, if for some reason, we are unable to ship your order, our team will be in touch with you and a refund will be processed. Please note that Saturdays, Sundays and Public Holidays are not considered business days for standard deliveries. You can view our full shipping policy here.

settings.title: Do you ship internationally?
settings.subtitle: Yes, we do! We ship to only a few countries outside of India as of now. These are:Canada, United States, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Norway, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom, Australia, Singapore, the UAE, and Hong Kong.

settings.title: In which case can I return a product?
settings.subtitle: You can return the product if an incorrect or damaged product was sent to you. In the rare chance that you receive a defective product or a product damaged in transit, please get in touch with us through email at hello@studiocovers.co or through WhatsApp at +91 9899971104.

settings.title: How do I send a return request?
settings.subtitle: Please write to us either via via email and we’ll get back to you within 2-4 business days. Please make sure the tags are intact. Also, do take a photo of the product and share it in your email/message. You can review our full returns policy in the footer.

settings.title: The discount code I received from the Wheel of Fortune did not get applied. Now what?
settings.subtitle:
The entire process of receiving the discount code through the Wheel of Fortune is automated. Sometimes we do receive queries though stating that the code could not be applied. There could be a few reasons for this: 1) you forgot to enter the discount code in the discount code section during checkout, 2) you instead entered the discount code in the "Notes" section, and 3) you wish to use the discount code after the time has expired.

In case of the first two cases, kindly contact us as soon as possible if you believe your code wasn't applied. Your request will be judged on a case-to-case basis. We will try our level best to help you out. With that said, please note that in case there is proof that you had received the discount code, we will not be able to edit your order amount.

settings.title: Are all your products made in India?
settings.subtitle: Yes!

settings.title: Where does your fabric come from?
settings.subtitle: Everything you see on the website has been designed by us. Our fabric sources are varied are in our collections we include some reputed Indian as well as international brands.

settings.title: Is your brand ethical?
settings.subtitle: Yes! We are a vegan brand striving to make sure we leave behind a better world. You can read about our ethics here.

settings.title: I am a representative from an NGO and I’d like to work with you.
settings.subtitle: Studio Covers is constantly on the lookout for opportunities that make sure prosperity reaches the grassroots level. If you are an NGO that works with local artisans and craftspeople and women in rural India, please head to the contact page and send us a message. Someone will be in touch with you within one work week. We also love to support eco friendly businesses, environmental organisations, and animal rights organisations.

settings.title: I'd like to collaborate with you. How should I proceed?
settings.subtitle: Please take a look at our Collaborate With Us page for more info. on the same. We look forward to working with you!

settings.title: I am in the media and I’d like to cover your brand.
settings.subtitle: Be our guest - we love the attention! Send us a message via the contact form and one of our marketing persons will get in touch with you within one work week.

settings.title: Is it safe to shop on your website using my Debit or Credit Card?
settings.subtitle: Yes, our website is SSL certified which means that any information you enter stays absolutely secure.

settings.title: I would like to better understand how my information is being used.
settings.subtitle: Ah, nothing too fancy. Take a look at our privacy policy in the footer under the section titled "Customer Service."

settings.title: Our Story
settings.content:
The beginnings of Covers go back some thirty years when Nirmal Pathak, the wife of a retired army officer, found herself at a loose end and facing an empty nest situation of sorts. With no experience as a business person - unless one were to count the few months in the ‘80s when she assisted a German designer friend - she proceeded to set up shop in a car garage with one sewing machine and one karigar named Ram Shankar - who, it just so happens, is still with us.


Running in parallel is her daughter’s story. Sonali was trying to get her own interior design studio to take off back in the 1990s and it was not long before the mother-daughter joined forces. They worked out of the garage making curtains, blinds, and bed coordinates for clients who had miraculously materialized. Hard work began to pay off and Covers went from the car garage to a tiny factory to larger premises. The one karigar setup turned into four into thirty.


Fast forward to 2020 and we have done some 60 odd 5-star hotels and resorts and close to 500 high-end residences (read about our projects here). The growth has been completely organic with our clients becoming our biggest advocates. We are now moving into the next stage of Covers: Studio Covers. We’re going online and we hope to make the process of home decor a fun, beautiful, and clean one. Thank you for joining us on the next stage of our journey.

settings.title: Our Core Team of Workers
settings.text:
The people who make the magic happen. From left to right:
Bhushan, Lallan, Akash, Jagdish, Kuldeep, Shankar, Guddu, Rakesh, Anwar and Sahil

settings.title: Our Philosophy
settings.content:
Doing right by ourselves: We want to create beautiful work that brings joy. We should have a lovely time creating it and you, the customer, should have a wonderful time experiencing it. We only create what resonates with us - we will never “churn” out products. We believe in minimalism. We truly believe “less is more.” Why add clutter to an already crowded world?

Doing right by our workers: Our workers are the reason we can bring our vision to life. Without them, there will be no Studio Covers. Each of our workers adds a little bit of themselves to the piece they're working on and we would not want to lose that because that is the essence of our work.  We want to make sure we do right by them - which means making sure they’re looked after. It would break our heart to hear our gifted embroider saying that he doesn’t want his children to follow in his footsteps and he’d rather they work in an office. It is up to us to keep local arts and crafts alive. 

Finding the right associates: We want to work with people and businesses who have the same beliefs as we do. Who believe in sustainability,  animal rights, feminism, ethical consumption, fair wages, worker benefits, and a better future. These are not just buzzwords for us. We want - need - to make a difference in the world. And this change starts with living in line with our beliefs and making sure we work with those who do too. 

Doing right by our clients and customers: Our style may not be everyone’s cup of tea, neither do we expect it to be. Like with everything, our approach toward our customer is driven by integrity. We want to bring joy into your homes in the form of our cushions or throws or table runners. It’s the smallest things that have the largest impact.

Doing right by the Earth: We are trying our best to move toward an ethically-sourced and environmentally-kind way of doing things. All our products are vegan and we're trying to do things in as sustainable and eco friendly a fashion as we can. We aren't quite there yet but we are sincere in our efforts and we do walk the talk.

settings.title: Shabby + Chic
settings.text: Victorian England meets your grandma’s sweater wrapped in the smell of freshly baked bread. Shabby Chic is comforting, romantic, and idyllic - the antithesis of flashy.

settings.title: Join Us On The Journey
settings.subheading: Sign up for our newsletter, latest blog posts and updates

settings.title: WHO ARE WE?
settings.content: A mindful soft furnishings venture spanning three generations of women and three decades. We believe in creating soft minimal, sustainable, and cruelty-free luxury products that help you do up your space in a way that rings true to you. Read our story here.

settings.custom_html:
Explore Luxury Cushion Covers, Throws, and Table Runners Online

Studio Covers is all about creating sustainable luxury for those who appreciate the finer things in life. At the moment, our product offering includes luxury cushion covers, throws, table runners, curated cushion cover sets, and cushion pairs. We believe in creating luxury that lasts using materials that are eco-friendly, and in the process contributing directly to reducing our carbon footprint. Who said luxury and kindness cannot go together? In fact, there is no other way. Join the ethical and sustainable home decor movement with Studio Covers. Read our full story here.

Our Popular Cushion categories

Explore from our wide collection of luxurious products - embroidered cushion covers, sustainable cushion covers created using cotton and linen, velvet cushion covers, vegan silk covers and more. Whatever your style may be, we have something for you - contemporary pillows and throws, shabby chic decor products, farmhouse chic decor, cottagecore, minimal home decor, bohemian home decor and traditional Indian decor.

Our Return Policy:

We at Studio Covers have a no-questions-asked return and exchange policy for our customers across India. If you let us know that you’d like to exchange or return a product within the first 4 days of it being delivered to you, and the products pass the quality check once we receive them back, we will refund you in full without asking why. Though let’s be honest, you’re probably not going to want to exchange or return them.

Types of Cushion:

There are a variety of cushion covers below that you can choose from, depending on your home's aesthetics. We offer the best luxury cushion covers online, including: Decorative cushions, designer cushions covers, embroidered cushions, handmade cushion covers, floral cushion covers, velvet cushion covers, traditional cushion covers, geometric cushion covers and more

Regions We Deliver

We ship internationally, including to the US, the UK, Ireland, Australia, Singapore, the UAE, Hong Kong, Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Austria, Sweden, and many more EU countries. We also ship to metro and non-metro cities and towns across India- Mumbai, Delhi, Chandigarh, Hyderabad, Bengaluru, Pune, Bathinda, New Delhi, Chennai, Gurgaon and many more. Click here to see all the countries we ship to
